vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Neh.9.4
§ Bunni = "built"
1) a Levite in the time of Nehemiah
2) another Levite of earlier date
vocabinfos._es_Definition: ancestro de Semaías, levita ; (a)   levita; post exílico; (b)   jefe de familia; post exílico
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
布尼 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "建造"
1) 尼希米時代的一個利未人 (尼9:4)
2) 另一利未人 (尼10:15,11:15)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
布尼 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "建造"
1) 尼希米时代的一个利未人 (尼9:4)
2) 另一利未人 (尼10:15,11:15)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Neh.10.15
§ Bunni = "built"
1) a Levite in the time of Nehemiah
2) another Levite of earlier date

A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Neh.11.15;
father of: Hashabiah (H2811H)
§ Bunni = "built"
1) a Levite in the time of Nehemiah
2) another Levite of earlier date
